name: HeartBeats Story
description:
In HeartBeats Story, you are a person who desperately seeks the love of his life (in a speed dating). Take part in a series of questions/answers to learn more about the person in front of you. You’ll only have three chances to find your soul mate.

The aim is to achieve as many dates as possible. You have to answer the questions with as many correct answers as possible. The seduction bar will increase or decrease according to the answers to the questions. You lose the date if you choose wrong answers and if the bar is below the seduction threshold.

You have to move the glass to choose answers. Vibrations simulate a heartbeat more or less strong accord
ing to the increase of the seduction bar.
